title: Creating Animated Videos with FFmpeg
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A colorful animation with a play button in the center]
narration: Welcome! Today, we'll explore how to create animated videos using FFmpeg, a powerful command-line tool.

title: What is FFmpeg?
content:
A free and open-source multimedia framework
Supports a wide range of audio and video formats
Can be used for encoding, decoding, streaming, and more
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: FFmpeg logo with a command line interface in the background]
narration: FFmpeg is a versatile tool that can handle various multimedia tasks. It's free and open-source, making it accessible to everyone.

title: Basic FFmpeg Commands
content:
**Column 1: Creating a Video**
'ffmpeg -i input.jpg -t 5 -r 24 -s 1280x720 output.mp4'
**Column 2: Converting a Video**
'ffmpeg -i input.avi -c:v libx264 -c:a aac output.mp4'
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A screenshot of a terminal window with FFmpeg commands]
narration: Let's look at some basic FFmpeg commands. The first command creates a simple video from an image, setting the duration, frame rate, and resolution. The second command converts an AVI video to MP4 using the H.264 codec.

title: Creating Animated GIFs
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A colorful animated GIF of a cat playing with a ball of yarn]
narration: FFmpeg can also create animated GIFs from videos. This command extracts frames from a video at a rate of 10 frames per second and creates a GIF.

title: Adding Text and Images
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A video with text overlayed on top of it]
narration: FFmpeg allows you to add text and images to your videos. This command adds text to a video using the drawtext filter.

title: Resources and Documentation
content:
FFmpeg Official Website
FFmpeg Documentation
FFmpeg Tutorials on YouTube
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A list of links to resources and documentation]
narration: For more information and advanced techniques, visit the FFmpeg official website, explore the documentation, and check out tutorials on YouTube.

title: Conclusion
content:
FFmpeg is a powerful tool for creating animated videos
It offers a wide range of options for customization
With practice, you can create stunning animations
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A collection of various animated videos created with FFmpeg]
narration: FFmpeg is a powerful tool for creating animated videos. It offers a wide range of customization options. With practice, you can create stunning animations.

title: Thank You!
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A thank you message with a waving hand emoji]
narration: Thank you for watching! I hope this video has been helpful. Happy animating!
